channel.title: Glean API Deprecations
channel.description: Deprecated endpoints, fields, and parameters in Glean's APIs

item.title: Deprecation: citations field on POST /rest/api/v1/chat
item.description:
Use inline citations via ChatMessageFragment.citation and ChatMessageCitation.referenceRanges instead. This field is still populated for backward compatibility.

Removal date: 2026-10-15

item.title: Deprecation: POST /rest/api/v1/listanswers endpoint on POST /rest/api/v1/listanswers
item.description:
Answer boards have been removed and this endpoint no longer serves a purpose

Removal date: 2026-10-15
